date_publish: July 08, 2012 In 2008, Klitschko stopped Thompson in the 11th round.
text: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Tony Thompson in the sixth round to keep a comfortable hold on his WBA, IBF and WBO heavyweight titles Saturday night. The 36 - year - old champion Klitschko, 58 - 3 with 51 knockouts, floored Thompson with a big right hand near the end of the fifth round at Stade de Suisse, and the 40 - year - old American never recovered. The Ukrainian champion dropped Thompson again in the sixth, and referee Sam Williams gave the challenger a standing count before stopping the fight at 2 : 56. "Thompson was not so easy to box. I'm satisfied, "Klitschko said.
title: Wladimir Klitschko stops Tony Thompson in 6th round to retain world heavyweight belts.
